ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Survey - System standards and Performance
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm, I need to upgrade again I think... Computer Specs for Bards CPU:  P3 450 RAM:  256 meg Video Card (and RAM): Viper 770 Video Resolution: 800x600 Sound
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm, I need to upgrade again I think...

Computer Specs for Bards

CPU: P3 450
RAM: 256 meg
Video Card (and RAM): Viper 770
Video Resolution: 800x600
Sound Card: A3
HD speed (rpm): not off the top of my head
'Net speed: Cable modem
Geographic Location: colorado (n of Tani and Halana I think)
Options enabled or disabled:
Sky texturing: Double Layer
Particle Effects: Off in Kunark, On in Old World
Mip Mapping: Not on yur life
Clip plane distance: Max in Old World, 50% in Kunark

How many songs can you twist? 4
Do you slow down when it rains? no, never have even when I had a 200 mhz
How about in Unrest or Kunark? 4, 3 if there's too many finger twiddlers
